name: All-Star Baseball 2000
overview: Using real licensed teams and players from the 1999 season, ALL-STAR BASEBALL 2000 challenges you to take your favorite MLB team to a World Series victory. ALL-STAR BASEBALL 2000 offers a wide variety of gameplay options. If you think you have what it takes to play through a full season of MLB action, try the Season mode. If you like to cut to the chase, go straight to the Playoffs. Practice up your swing in the Batting Practice mode, and then prove your skills in the Home Run Derby! When you're ready, take to the field with the greats of the sport in an All-Star Game. Choose between manual and automatic fielding. Need to hold off on your pennant race until another day? No problem! Save your team's progress using the handy password function.
